```scss
// Property: tabMode
// Description: Property defining which tabMode is used for the TabGroup.
// Component(s): Ti.UI.TabGroup
'.tab-mode-fixed[platform=android]': { tabMode: Ti.UI.Android.TAB_MODE_FIXED }
'.tab-mode-scrollable[platform=android]': { tabMode: Ti.UI.Android.TAB_MODE_SCROLLABLE }
```
